text: @samah.173 no one put down diversity.  What I did is illustrate the lack of diversity in the pamphlet.  Don't be ignorant.

@loiacarson yeah it's just that you did make an important boys, men are not included in these campaigns at all which is wrong. But by putting down other types of diversity youre making your point seem silly, which of course it is not. Cause if someone were to read the caption, they would dismiss you point cause of all the other stuff you wrote.

@samah.173 oh!! Hmmmm maybe?  I see your point.  That wasn't mine though, so you missed my point and interpreted the meme differently.  That's ok though I won't judge you.  If you're ever involved with putting together a pamphlet like this one or in a place where you may influence those who may be doing so please remind them - don't forget our Brothers are people too.

When making a post about not having enough diversity in that the poster did not include men (which is a valid point), why do you then go on to make it seem like other types of diversity is bad? If it's "PC" to include different races and backgrounds, surely it's also "PC" to include all genders?? Your points seem to be contradicting each other
